author: timbeiko
content: `@channel` is anyone opposed to moving this week's implementers call from 14:00 UTC to 15:00 UTC? It would help some folks on our team attend: https://github.com/ethereum/pm/issues/209

author: ankur2534
content: How should clients prevent tx spam attacks under EIP 1559? In the current system, geth and OE have a "minimum bump" before the client will accept+relay a tx that has been replaced with a higher Fee. I believe 10% for Geth and 12.5% for OE

author: ankur2534
content: I assume clients would just do a minimum bump but for basefee? Or basefee + miner tip?

author: timbeiko
content:
> I assume clients would just do a minimum bump but for basefee? Or basefee + miner tip?
I would assume for `feecap` or `tip`, yes. `basefee` is part of the block header
